tool.name: Authentication
tool.summary: It is required before using the toolbox. There is a validation requiring the authentication every 24 hours. You need to use your e-mail registered with Leaf in the "API Owner" field and the password too.
tool.usage:
You need to use your e-mail registered with Leaf in the "API Owner" field and the password too.

If you try to use a tool without authentication or if your authentication has expired (after 24 hours from the last authentication) you will see the following message: "Tool is not licensed".

After the authentication you can use any tool available, it is unnecessary to authenticate before every consecutive tool usage.

Leaf documentation
